data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 900 people living in Berry Islands, Bahamas. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Berry Islands, Bahamas
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Berry Islands to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Berry Islands prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 494 people in the state of Berry Islands who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 356 believers in the state of Berry Islands the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Berry Islands, Bahamas a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Berry Islands, Bahamas from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.
